data.claim: Google Workspace MCP (github.com/taylorwilsdon/google_workspace_mcp, 1.4k stars) provides full control over: Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Docs, Sheets, Slides, Forms, Tasks, Contacts, Chat. Supports OAuth 2.1, multi-user auth, CLI for Claude Code. Most feature-complete Google integration available.
data.snippet: Full natural language control over Google Calendar, Drive, Gmail, Docs, Sheets, Slides, Forms, Tasks, Contacts, and Chat through all MCP clients. The most feature-complete Google Workspace MCP server.
